DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to clarify treatment status and clinical results of acute cerebral ischemia after approval of clot retriever in Japan, and also to obtain a basis for comparative studies.
DOC.brief_title: Recovery by Endovascular Salvage for Cerebral Ultra-acute Embolism (RESCUE)-Japan Registry 2
DOC.criteria: Patients admitted from Oct. 1st 2014 to Sep. 30st 2016. Patients who were 20 years and older admitted within 24 hours after onset. The patients with large vessel occlusion (ICA, MCA, VA, BA, PCA). Patients who did not fulfill the criteria of RESCUEJapan RCT. ï½¥Patients who are considered inappropriate to participate in the study are excluded.
